divs: sighting detailsi hope this is the right place to post this sort of sighting as it is not a ufo in the sense that we know of it but is a phenomena that is not clearly identified or understood. after picking up my daughter at 9\10\2005, 11:12pm from work, we had arrived home at 11:15pm - 11:20pm. we proceeded to walk into the house but was startled by a faintly green haze (we live in a highly polluted light area surrounded by portland \ beaverton \ hillsboro) spanning from northwest to northeast. i suddenly called out my oldest daughter to come and see the awesome sight. so, there are 3 witnesses that viewed the phenomena. continuing with the "light show", it appeared to get brighter and then it dimmed and disappeared. it suddenly appeared again in the east as a spherical shape (like a fog haze but visually noticable) then dimming a disappearing. then about a minute later, appears again spanning nw to ne. the whole affair lasted 15-20 minutes and did not appear for at least 30 minutes before we gave up and went back into the house. note: the light is green. no other colors of the light spectrum appears. the phenomena as it appeared did not seem to be an 'aurora borealis' which is why i am reporting it here.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Beaverton
There were no other sightings in Beaverton on or around September 10th 2005
Summary: Not a UFO, but Aurora Borealis? HAARP maybe?
